price: Ìjọ (Ànábì) Nūh pe òdodo ní irọ́ ṣíwájú wọn. Àwọn ìjọ (mìíràn) lẹ́yìn wọn (náà ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀). Ìjọ kọ̀ọ̀kan ló gbèrò láti ki Òjíṣẹ́ wọn mọ́lẹ̀. Wọ́n fi irọ́ ja òdodo níyàn nítorí kí wọ́n lè fi wó òdodo lulẹ̀. Mo sì gbá wọn mú. Nítorí náà, báwo ni ìyà (tí Mo fi jẹ wọ́n) ti rí (lára wọn ná)!
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۖ وَهَمَّتۡ كُلُّ أُمَّةِۭ بِرَسُولِهِمۡ لِيَأۡخُذُوهُۖ وَجَٰدَلُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّ فَأَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wal-aḥzābu min baʿdihim wahammat kullu ummatin birasūlihim liyakhudhūhu wajādalū bil-bāṭili liyud'ḥiḍū bihi al-ḥaqa fa-akhadhtuhum fakayfa kāna ʿiqābi
